data.actual_result: You go back straight to chat
data.expected_result: You should go back to Quick Switcher
data.short_description: Going back from the Join Server screen accessed via Quick Switcher closes the Quick Switcher
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to Quick Switcher - Type random letters in the searchfield so no results show - in "other options" select "join a server"  - When you are on the Join Server screen, press Back
